page.title: 01ATTITUDES
page.content: Results of residents questionaire : Four out of 11 people interviewed said that they wanted to see changes. 4 people of elderly age said they liked the changes they had seen whist living in Aveley particulary the new shops, they included :- the new International supermarket the newsagents the banks Younger people said the new facilities such as the car-parks, the golf-club and the swimming pool had made the town a better place to live.The by-pass which diverts traffic out of the High-street had according to both young and old greatly improved the town. Young people (teenagers) said they wanted{more}leisure facilities.
